casebody.data:
No. 10-902. Walter McGill, dba Creation 7th Day Adventist Church, Petitioner v. General Conference Corporation of Seventh-Day Adventists, et al. 563 U.S. 936, 131 S. Ct. 2097,

179 L. Ed. 2d 891,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3071. April 18, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 617 F.3d 402.
